# setContentScrollView(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the scroll view that bars observe for all edges of the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func setContentScrollView(_ scrollView: UIScrollView?)
```

## Parameters

- **scrollView**: The scroll view to observe.

## Discussion

Calling this convenience method is identical to calling [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/setContentScrollView(_:for:)] and passing [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSDirectionalRectEdge/all] for the `edge` parameter.

## Working with scrolling content

- **setContentScrollView(_:for:)**: Sets the scroll view that bars observe for the specified edge.
- **contentScrollView(for:)**: Returns the scroll view the view controller observes for the specified edge.
